GSD.description:
firmware: arm_scpi: Ensure scpi_info is not assigned if the probe fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 08272646cd7c310642c39b7f54348fddd7987643. For more details please see the references link.
